description.des-2:
I've always liked computing and it's something I've left unfinished since I left college. Now I want to work Programming, I really want to learn, I know what you learn by working you don't learn in any course or training
    I keep trying to polish my knowledge in Java, SQL, Git, html, CSS because I consider myself a proactive, responsible, friendly person, eager to learn and face new challenges in order to develop as a professional.

aptitude.apt-1: Ability to work in a team
